      • createPatientRecord

        public int createPatientRecord(Patient p)
        Inserts a patient record into Patients table. It is assumed that there is no record for this patient exists yet.
        Parameters:
        p - Patient to be inserted.
        Returns:
        0 if inserted sucessfully, 1 otherwise.

      • updatePatientRecord

        public int updatePatientRecord(Patient oldRecord,
                               Patient newRecord)
        Updates a patient record. Note: all old info will be overwritten with that from the new Patient object.
        Parameters:
        oldRecord - Old record of the patient.
        newRecord - New record of the patient.
        Returns:

        Returns:

        Returns:
